name: Pet Mind
description: PetMind is an innovative web platform designed to connect pet owners with reliable and trusted pet minders in their locality. This project aimed to simplify the process of finding and booking professional pet care services, ensuring peace of mind for pet owners and high-quality care for pets.

name: Weather App
description: This project is a prototype for a specialized weather app designed specifically for climbers, providing crucial real-time, location-based weather updates to ensure safe and optimal climbing experiences. The project focuses on delivering accurate and reliable weather information tailored to the needs of climbers.
